name: Frankie's Diner
description:
Play as chef and Diner owner Frankie in the midst of a pandemic in Monster City. Serve customers, upgrade your diner, and make choices that may leave a lasting impact. The fate and survival of your Diner falls in your hands as you deal with the challenges the pandemic brings.  

Year and Term of Capstone:  Capstone2, Term 1 , AY 2021-2022, De La Salle-College of Saint Benilde

5GUYS1GAME:

Lead Designer and UI Artist: Timothy John Ureta

Lead Programmer: Howe Andre Luke Yap

Programmer and VFX Artist:  Coby Arriola 

Character and Background Artist: Rafael John Deleste

Animator, Story and Sound Designer: Renzo Teves
